converter
Class VectorToGridConverter

java.lang.Object
  converter.VectorToGridConverter
public class VectorToGridConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Class for converting Vectordata (shapeFiles) to Rasterdata (RectifiedGridCoverages)

Author:
N. Peiler

Method Detail

toGrid

public RectifiedGridCoverage toGrid(java.util.List featureList,
                                    java.lang.String propertyName,
                                    java.util.Hashtable propertyTable,
                                    RectifiedGridCoverage rg)
converts a List of Features to a RectifiedGridCoverage

Parameters:
featureList - List of Features
propertyName - Name of property of feature, which should be the value of gridcell
propertyTable - Mapping of key and propertyValue (e.g. landuseTypeList)
rg - RectifiedGridCoverage that defines the origin, offset and gridRange of the new grid
Returns:
new RectifiedGridCoverage

converts a landuse ShapeFile to a LanduseGrid

propertyName - Name of property of feature, which should be the value of gridcell

LanduseGrid
